attributes.action: Councill tax should be free for all
attributes.additional_details: Three family's have already can't afford to pay there council
attributes.background: Council tax  should be free for all  people with family can't afford to pay there own council tax we want that government should change it and make it free for all

rejection.details: We're not sure whether you would like council tax to be abolished entirely, or whether you would like an exemption for people with families (eg. dependent children).
